full_title: Smeraldo Garden Marching Band by Jimin (지민) (Ft. Loco (로꼬))
title: Smeraldo Garden Marching Band

description.plain:
A pre-released single off Jimin’s second solo album, “MUSE", “Smeraldo Garden Marching Band,” is described as follow: "Sweeping instrumental swells and rap converge in a tongue-in-cheek collab.”

In [the MV] (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIER2z3DBe8&ab_channel=HYBELABELS), Jimin and Loco are capturing together what a happy feeling can be.

The song draws inspiration from marching bands, blending hip-hop elements with the big band sound characterized by a large-scale orchestra, creating an up-beat, lively rhythm and dynamic atmosphere thanks to an assist from South Korean rapper Loco.

embed_content: Read “Smeraldo Garden Marching Band” by Jimin (지민) on Genius
recording_location: Dogg Bounce / Locomotive, grayground. / Adorable Trap / REALWORLD / Champagne Therapy Studios / Seoul Studio

Oh, say, "love"

다 전해줄 거야 (Just for you)
